name: Frederick HILLIARD, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellee

parties: Frederick HILLIARD, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of July, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
48 A.3d 1231
Frederick HILLIARD, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellee.
